comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: The recent resignation of Liz Truss will reassure the economy a little, and the central bank may be able to control the market for several more weeks, but the problem has now turned into a political par excellence. The failure to choose the government for the next week may cause a lot of economic problems, which means that Britain dispenses with it.The appointment of the new government may solve many problems, but most of the costs will be paid by the citizen, which will accelerate early elections that may further complicate the situation.
